text: The President of the United Republic of Tanzania () is the head of state and head of government of Tanzania. The president leads the executive branch of the Government of Tanzania and is the commander-in-chief of the armed forces. ==List== # Julius Kambarage Nyerere 1962 -1985 # Ali Hassan Mwinyi 1985 - 1995 # Benjamin Mkapa 1995 - 2005 # Jakaya Kikwete 2005 - 2015 # John Joseph Magufuli 2015 - 2021 # Samia Suluhu since 2021 ==References== *
title: President of Tanzania
